title: Font used on the Key Caps of the Apple Lisa computer keyboard (circa 1984)
content:
Looking for the letters/ numbers on the key caps - special characters on the key-pad will have to be reproduced separately.

This keyboard was made before the days of "computer fonts" and the font may have been created by Apple just for this keyboard. I am looking for the closest I can get - Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203558im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Keyboard_4598.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203558im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Keypad_4317.jpg)
author: Runklebump
